problems.title: Airway Blocked Message
problems.description: The LCD screen shows an animation of a blockage even after cleaning the filter.
possible_causes: Hidden dust inside the built-in crevice tool
solution_steps: Remove the wand and check the built-in dusting and crevice tool for lint.
Tap the HEPA filter firmly to dislodge fine dust.
Ensure the filter is 100% dry (48 hours).

problems.title: Battery Run Time Low
problems.description: Vacuum doesn't last 70 minutes as advertised.
solution_steps: Switch to Auto or Eco mode.
The Gen5 battery is click-in and can be swapped easily.
